userdoc.notice: TransferOnion is a hash onion for distributing tokens. The shell commits         to an ordered list of the token transfers and can be permissionlessly         unwrapped in order. The SENDER must `approve` this contract as         `transferFrom` is used to move the token balances.

params._sender: Address of the sender to distribute from.
params._token: Address of the token to distribute.

params._layers: Array of onion layers to peel.
